E

edu.stanford.cs.pptx - package edu.stanford.cs.pptx
This package defines a set of classes that make it possible to write PowerPoint slides from Java programs.
edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart - package edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart
This package defines a set of classes for making animated charts on a PowerPoint slides.
edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code - package edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code
This package defines a set of classes that make it possible to generate code traces in a PowerPoint slide.
endDeclarations() - Method in class edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code.PPFunction
Marks the end of the local variable declarations.
